mapper.select: SELECT ACTS.ACS_NUM, AB.ACT_TITLE, CASE WHEN AU.USER_NAME IS NULL THEN AU.USER_LINE_NAME ELSE AU.USER_NAME END AS USER_NAME, AB.JOIN_CODE, AB.USER_NUM AS HOST_USER_NUM FROM ACTIVITY_SET ACTS JOIN ACTIVITY_BASIC AB ON ACTS.ACT_NUM = AB.ACT_NUM JOIN APP_USER AU ON AB.USER_NUM = AU.USER_NUM WHERE ACTS.USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND ACTS.STATUS = #{status}
WITH ACT_NUM_LIST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ACT_NUM FROM ACTIVITY_SET WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} ) SELECT DISTINCT USER_NUM FROM ACTIVITY_SET ACS JOIN ACT_NUM_LIST ANL ON ACS.ACT_NUM = ANL.ACT_NUM

WITH ACT_NUM_LIST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ACT_NUM FROM ACTIVITY_SET WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} ), USER_NUM_LIST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT USER_NUM FROM ACTIVITY_SET ACS JOIN ACT_NUM_LIST ANL ON ACS.ACT_NUM = ANL.ACT_NUM ) SELECT
FROM APP_USER AU JOIN USER_NUM_LIST UNL ON AU.USER_NUM = UNL.USER_NUM
